q: Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a ''crook'' in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host ''insane'' and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying.
